suite.name: Teste Login

test.name: Cenario 1: Login Com Sucesso

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.msg: Text 'Sair' did not appear in 2 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: Text 'Sair' did not appear in 2 seconds.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: error=O campo de email não apareceu. Verifique o print na pasta de logs.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Finalizar Teste Com Debug
kw.msg: No keyword with name 'Finalizar Teste Com Debug' found.
kw.status: No keyword with name 'Finalizar Teste Com Debug' found.

test.doc: Garante que estamos deslogados, loga e valida o acesso.
test.status: Teardown failed: No keyword with name 'Finalizar Teste Com Debug' found.
